name: Alpha Kimori: Great Doubt - Episode One
name_original: Alpha Kimori: Great Doubt - Episode One
description:
Alpha Kimori: Great Doubt - Episode One is a RPG game developed by Sherman3D. It was originally released in 2014. Big Fish Games published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Alpha Kimori: Great Doubt - Episode One on PC.
